title: GD I need some advice on writing a cover letter.
body:
I have recently decided to make a career move to my old city where there are more opportunities. My problem is I have never been good at writing cover letters. 

The job I am applying for is a software trainer, I know I have the ability to do the job but I don't think my credentials will show that. 

I have done pretty much everything the job entails to a lesser degree as extra stuff from my current job and at college but I don't have a full degree so I think that may hurt me.
